author: Logan Plant
title: Ubisoft Announces Month of Free Games, Game Trials to Include Assassin's Creed, Rayman, and More
description: Ubisoft will offer free games and trials over the next month to encourage people to stay home during the COVID-19 outbreak. The promotion begins with Rayman Legends.
content: Ubisoft announced it will provide a month-long series of free game trials, discounts, and other offers to support people staying at home during the COVID-19 outbreak.The promotion begins with Rayman Legends, which is available to download and keep for free be… [+1244 chars]
